Row.Text: [COLOR_CYAN]* National Wonder (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All newly-trained non-air Units in this City receive the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Morale[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, improving [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength by 15%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Barracks in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.

[COLOR_CYAN]* National Wonder (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]All newly-trained non-air Units in this City receive the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Morale[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, improving [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength by 15%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Barracks in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.
